bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to authorize a State in which a remedial action is being conducted at a hazardous waste facility to recover costs associated with such action from the State in which the waste was generated.
